title: ErgOne
summary: ErgOne is an innovative token built on the Ergo blockchain that implements the Proof-of-Commitment Protocol (PoCoP), a unique approach to incentivizing community engagement and ecosystem growth. The PoCoP protocol rewards active participation in the Ergo ecosystem through creating and sharing content, engaging with the community, contributing creative materials, and voting on community content. Users can earn ErgOne tokens based on their Virality Score, which measures their contributions. To get started, users can visit the ErgOne platform, register their Ergo wallet address, and begin submitting content and voting on community contributions.

sections.heading: ErgOne
sections.content: ErgOne ($Erg0ne) is an innovative token built on the Ergo blockchain that implements the Proof-of-Commitment Protocol (PoCoP) - a unique approach to incentivizing community engagement and ecosystem growth.

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.content:
The PoCoP protocol rewards active participation in the Ergo ecosystem through:

- Creating and sharing content about Ergo
- Engaging with the community
- Contributing creative materials
- Voting on community content

Your contributions are measured by a Virality Score that ensures fair distribution of $Erg0ne token rewards.

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.content:
1. Visit [ErgOne Platform](https://app.ergone.io/)
2. Register your Ergo wallet address in the Dashboard
3. Start submitting content and voting on community contributions
4. Earn $Erg0ne tokens based on your engagement

Join the ErgOne community in shaping the future of blockchain engagement, where commitment and creativity drive ecosystem growth.
